byline.original: By AL BAKER and CHRISTOPHER MAAG

abstract: A teenager and two relatives were charged in the fatal shooting on Friday of a woman who tried to shield a group of children from a hail of bullets.
snippet: A teenager and two relatives were charged in the fatal shooting on Friday of a woman who tried to shield a group of children from a hail of bullets.
lead_paragraph: Three days after a 34-year-old woman was killed by gunfire in Brooklyn as she picked up her child after school, detectives arrested the suspected gunman, his brother and a half-brother, the police said Tuesday.

headline.main: 3 Arrested in Killing of Woman Near School
